Description: Functional Area – Quality & Operational Excellence Job Family – Quality & OpEx Job: Quality & Operational Excellence Technician Typical Reporting Line: Quality Manager Mission Statement: Act to improve safety, operating efficiency, quality and productivity in the value chain, to improve customer satisfaction and increase profitability in a safe working environment across the local business. Main Accountabilities: Quality metrics Reports in an accurate and timely manner on Quality and Operational Excellence (Q&OpEx) metrics and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for the analysis and management of local processes. Process audits Conducts process audits to ensure the conformance of working practices with established processes and procedures. Measurement Utilizes measurement systems to produce data that reflect the accurate characteristics of materials, products, systems, and processes. Process improvement Leads small groups of employees in the usage of the standard quality improvement approach (i.e, 8D / DMAIC/ A3…) to implement improvements in local procedures. Safety Performs assigned tasks in a safe manner that will encourage others to exercise safety in their normal daily activities. Qualification: DEE / BE (Electrical / Mechanical Engineer) Experience: 4 months to 8 years’ experience in Quality assurance activities like process review, inspection of transformer enclosures, Quality audit of vendors, Root cause analysis for the NCRs.Job Details
